author: mkwan
msg: Correct an error. The DTMDefaultBase.getPreviousSibling() interface
returns a node handle instead of a node identity.

author: mkwan
msg: Do not create the previous sibling array for XSLTC. This array is not used
in XSLTC's SAXImpl. Creating it is a waste of time.
We add a boolean flag to the constructors of DTMDefaultBase and its
subclasses to indicate whether the previous sibling array should be created.

author: mkwan
msg: Add a getTransformer() interface to TrAXFilter. This is a user requested
feature. This interface can be used by the UseXMLFilters samples to

author: ilene
msg: More sample and documentation updates from Christine Li (jycli@ca.ibm.com).

author: mkwan
msg: Small improvement to DescendantIterator and TypedDescendantIterator.
